mapper.sql: id, task_id, asset_type_id, changed, change_id, remark, must_replace_id, plan_id, material_type_id, amount

sql.trim: #{item.id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.taskId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.assetTypeId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.changed, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.changeId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.remark, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.mustReplaceId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.planId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.materialTypeId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.amount, jdbcType=NUMERIC},

mapper.select: select t.*, t3.name as repairProgramName, t4.line_name as lineName, t5.group_name as groupName, t6.name as workstationName, t7.name as locationName, t2.name, t2.code, t2.spec, t2.unit, t2.category1 as materialTypeCategory, t8.name as sysName from (select a.must_replace_id, SUM(a.amount) as amount from bu_repair_task_must_replace a left join bu_repair_plan_task a1 on a1.id = a.task_id where a1.plan_id = #{planId} group by a.must_replace_id) t left join bu_material_must_list t1 on t1.id = t.must_replace_id left join bu_material_type t2 on t1.material_type_id = t2.id left join bu_repair_program t3 on t3.id = t1.repair_program_id left join bu_mtr_line t4 on t4.line_id = t1.line_id left join bu_mtr_workshop_group t5 on t5.id = t1.group_id left join bu_mtr_workstation t6 on t6.id = t1.workstation_id left join bu_train_structure_detail t7 on t7.id = t1.location left join bu_train_asset_type t8 on t8.id = t1.sys_id order by t2.code

select t.*, t2.sys_id, t2.workstation_id from bu_repair_task_must_replace t left join bu_repair_plan_task t1 on t1.id = t.task_id left join bu_material_must_list t2 on t2.id = t.must_replace_id where t1.plan_id = #{planId}

select t.*, t3.name as repairProgramName, t4.line_name as lineName, t5.group_name as groupName, t6.name as workstationName, t7.name as locationName, t2.name, t2.code, t2.spec, t2.unit, t2.category1 as materialTypeCategory, t8.name as sysName from bu_repair_task_must_replace t left join bu_material_must_list t1 on t1.id = t.must_replace_id left join bu_material_type t2 on t1.material_type_id = t2.id left join bu_repair_program t3 on t3.id = t1.repair_program_id left join bu_mtr_line t4 on t4.line_id = t1.line_id left join bu_mtr_workshop_group t5 on t5.id = t1.group_id left join bu_mtr_workstation t6 on t6.id = t1.workstation_id left join bu_train_structure_detail t7 on t7.id = t1.location left join bu_train_asset_type t8 on t8.id = t1.sys_id where t.task_id = #{taskId} order by t2.code
